name: Sir Slithersworth
description:
Become Sir Slithersworth! Snake your way into the mind of Cameron, a child plagued by fear of the dark and disgusting vegetables. Survive in a dangerous mind, eating up Cameron's fears. Avoiding bumping into the trash and making Cameron think of chores. Play Story mode and eat up all the peas, or play Endless mode and see how long you can stay alive Featuring 2 original songs that tell the story of Sir Slithersworth and Cameron

______

Programming and Art by Jason Rand

Original Music by Victor Cristobal

Additional vocals by Jillian Wagner
